title: Recruitment
body:
my duo and I are looking for a group of people to do flex with and climb out of bronze, we are open to any lane as we play them all. 

please add "Toshiai, Kigahni"

replies.body: this is OCE boards, if your account is NA try their boards

Hey Toshiai, 

I usually play at night time (around 7:30 til 11 ish)  and play support champs. I'm keen to try flex (i haven't done placements yet) as I would like to play with a team because that reduces the chances of people getting toxic and throwing.

add me IG - same name as in forum :D

Hello Toshiaia and Kigahni, If your looking for league members to climb out of bronze. Check out https://discord.gg/Y93kJJN. If you are active enough i can allocate your own Team Voice Channel and grant player moving privileges. This discord now has over 100 active users.
